Title: Relates to programs, supports and services for individuals being released from state and local correctional facilities
Summary: Provides for programs, supports and services for individuals being released from state and local correctional facilities to ensure that such persons receive mental health and substance use disorder services, educational needs and job readiness services and housing assistance.
LawCode: Amd §§158 & 209, Soc Serv L; amd §112, add §§500-q & 71-b, Cor L; add §223-c, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, the correction law and the public housing law, in relation to programs, supports and services for individuals being released from state and local correctional facilities; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
